Bitfinex have borrowed ~700mil from Tether
Bitfinex pay a 'fair' interest rate on this loan
60million shares in Bitfinex were pledged as collateral
If CryptoCapital release the USD, no problem
If Bitfinex trades profitably, no problem

1095399989625335808.text:
We should avoid calling Beacon Chain ETH, BETH.

It's really just ETH locked into a floating rate bond. It's locked for some time, receiving interest. Just like bonds, it can be sold at or above current ETH market value.

We price bonds in USD, not BUSD.
